reviewText: This is the basic set of drills for potential operators to build speed, and accuracy.

Viking''s dvd end up more expensive than magpul's, because they sell each one separatel, while magpul sells in sets of four.  The information is great, but the two from VIking cost more and did not have as much total info as the set of four from magpul.
 The companies agree on several point but disagree on some things, and it's always nice to know the options, and know what they find to be a matter of personal choice, versus things they agree are absolute best methods, so i'm glad I have both viewpoints to consider.
Like all VTAC products this video is second to none.  Clear and concise.  Kyle and his demonstrators give me levels to aspire to.
short on material. mostly just them shooting and timing each other. that being said, if you have a good amount of background in weapon use it's not too bad for additional training ideas.
Feels like something of a money grab; there just isn't that much material here for the price. There IS some good stuff, though.
